body.name: NOISY TIGER 3 Way 4 Pin PWM Fan Splitter Cable, Sleeve Braided pc Fan Splitter 1 to 3 Converter 12 inches (2 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【Easy to install】The excellent 3 Way 4 pin PWM fan splitter cable connects 3 computer fans to one motherboard fan header, extension cable supports PWM function and speed regulation，compatible with all 4 pin and 3 pin case fans, designed for enthusiasts who need to control numerous case fans.

【Composition Of The 4 pin fan splitter】This PWM fan splitter hub, with a 4 pin female connector on one end, is split into two 3 pin and one 4 pin connectors on the other end. fan splitter extension cab er. This product measures approximately 12 inches in length and comes with 2 packages of 1 to 3 PWM fan splitter cable.
【CPU fan extension】This cost-effective of 4 pin fan splitter cables provide the more spare cable for adding fans to increase cooling in your computer case to ensure the operational speed of CPU.

【Stable and durable】The PC fan extension cable features a high-density black nylon braided sleeved cable to provide long-lasting performance and protect against dust and abrasion of the chassis fan distributor wires.
【Money-back Guarantee】We respond to all emails within 24 hours and offer a refund for issues if your fan dispenser fails to meet your expectations for any reason!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 4 pin PWM Case Fan Splitter NOISY TIGER PWM Fan Splitter Cable Pack provides a quick and simple solution for controlling case fans in a computer case. Easily realize 4Pin PWM temperature control fan parallel connection, make full use of the limited number of motherboard 4Pin connector, you can expand the connection of three 4Pin/3Pin fans.

Important Notes: Fan speed control must be supported by the motherboard in order to adjust the fan speed.ompatible with all 4 pin and 3 pin case fans.aximum power rating per fan: 35 watts.otherboard must support 3 fans.

Important Notes: Fan speed control must be supported by the motherboard in order to adjust the fan speed.ompatible with all 4 pin and 3 pin case fans.aximum power rating per fan: 35 watts.otherboard must support 3 fans.

Motherboard Connectors Our CPU Fan Extension Cable solves the pain of insufficient motherboard fan power connector and fan power cable length by lengthening the PWM Fan Cable. 4 pin/3 pin Fan Splitter All copper 4 pin fan extension cable Compatible with all 4-pin or 3-pin PWM case fans With 4-pin female and 4-pin male ports, also available for 3-pin CPU fans. Nylon Braided Sleeving Each PWM cable extension features a high-density black nylon braided sleeved cable to provide long-lasting performance and protect against dust and abrasion of the chassis fan distributor wires.

NOISY TIGER Brand Personal Computer Compatible Devices Female-to-Male Connector Gender Black Color Outdoor, Indoor Indoor/Outdoor Usage Round Shape 4 Number of Pins Unit Count Unit Count 2 Number of Items 35 watts Wattage Standard Packaging Package Type 12 x 0.4 x 0.4 inches Product Dimensions 0.63 ounces Item Weight NOISY TIGER Manufacturer B0C7KGJ53Z ASIN May 6, 2023 Date First Available

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality, very fast delivery, works as described.
reviews.reviewText: Nice quality, very fast delivery, works as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Makes hoking up multiple fans a lot simpler!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Fan Splitters
reviews.reviewText: I used these fan splitters in two different builds, and both worked perfectly. The motherboard of each PC did not have very many fan headers, so this solution worked great. The color matched the rest of the build, as did the braiding on the outside of the wires. I always use 4 pin splitters for variable speed fans, which is why I specifically got these. They seem well made and sturdy, I don't anticipate any issues in the future. I will be buying more of these

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy enough way to expand PC fan cabling
reviews.reviewText: I got this two-pack to allow me to mount more than the 2 fans my motherboard supports connecting. While it does work and lets you connect multiple fans into a single header, I did have a bit of trouble getting them to behave, as only 1 of the 3 tail-ends is still 4-pin for fan connecting. Easy enough thing to fix if you have the time to set up the fan control, but not as plug-and-play as I had hoped/expected. Still would recommend in a pinch though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy and decent looking
reviews.reviewText: Easy to plug up and use. They have the black braided look most nicer cables now have. These have a bit of length on them, but you may need to consider extensions based on how far apart your fans are, or just length so you can cable manage. Material quality is higher than I expected for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flexible fan splitter, easy to connect more fans
reviews.reviewText: I just needed a simple fan splitter that was a little longer and more flexible than the current cable I was using. This splitter got the job done. One connector has 4 pins to detect the fan speed, while the others just match the PWM output. The cable has tough protective braiding.No complaints. Works as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fan header splitter
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say about this...decent quality. Mesh sleeve looks nice. Splits one header to 3 allowing more fans without the need for a hub. I use both.Recommended.
